UniprotID	Q9BS26
Accession	Q9BS26;O60319;Q4VXC1;Q5VWZ7;Q6UW14;Q8WX67
EntryName	ERP44_HUMAN
ProteinName	Endoplasmic reticulum resident protein 44 (ER protein 44) (ERp44) (Thioredoxin domain-containing protein 4)
GeneName	ERP44 KIAA0573 TXNDC4 UNQ532/PRO1075
Length	406
Function	Mediates thiol-dependent retention in the early secretory pathway, forming mixed disulfides with substrate proteins through its conserved CRFS motif (PubMed:11847130, PubMed:14517240). Inhibits the calcium channel activity of ITPR1 (PubMed:15652484). May have a role in the control of oxidative protein folding in the endoplasmic reticulum (PubMed:11847130, PubMed:14517240, PubMed:29858230). Required to retain ERO1A and ERO1B in the endoplasmic reticulum (PubMed:11847130, PubMed:29858230).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum lumen
Disorder	0.0592,0.0313,0.0433,0.0287,0.0398,0.0258,0.0188,0.0141,0.0113,0.0102,0.0134,0.0096,0.0079,0.0050,0.0056,0.0075,0.0090,0.0134,0.0143,0.0253,0.0136,0.0133,0.0214,0.0138,0.0227,0.0240,0.0463,0.0888,0.0888,0.1528,0.2292,0.1476,0.1702,0.2470,0.3807,0.3460,0.3286,0.3286,0.2951,0.2034,0.1323,0.2224,0.1206,0.0734,0.1048,0.1070,0.0506,0.0287,0.0258,0.0227,0.0214,0.0209,0.0281,0.0275,0.0253,0.0275,0.0202,0.0108,0.0163,0.0205,0.0281,0.0424,0.0414,0.0568,0.0581,0.0690,0.0704,0.1476,0.1206,0.1449,0.2575,0.2752,0.2783,0.3249,0.3426,0.2783,0.1476,0.1969,0.3053,0.2224,0.2164,0.1731,0.1823,0.1823,0.2399,0.3215,0.3321,0.2328,0.1914,0.3117,0.2783,0.1823,0.1643,0.0948,0.0870,0.1251,0.1162,0.2328,0.2680,0.1881,0.2470,0.1611,0.1373,0.1275,0.1298,0.1349,0.1115,0.0870,0.1184,0.1349,0.1251,0.1399,0.1424,0.1449,0.2193,0.2364,0.2436,0.3215,0.2292,0.2193,0.2783,0.2064,0.2609,0.3807,0.3019,0.2129,0.2094,0.2609,0.3087,0.3392,0.3460,0.3566,0.3704,0.3704,0.3872,0.3983,0.3053,0.3053,0.3149,0.2951,0.2715,0.3117,0.3149,0.3494,0.3426,0.3426,0.4330,0.4330,0.4186,0.3983,0.3983,0.4119,0.3286,0.2224,0.3053,0.2129,0.1184,0.1914,0.2064,0.1914,0.2849,0.3117,0.3087,0.4017,0.3149,0.3053,0.3249,0.2129,0.2292,0.2258,0.1759,0.1554,0.1554,0.1528,0.1501,0.1476,0.2258,0.3426,0.2541,0.2129,0.1323,0.0799,0.0799,0.0631,0.0300,0.0506,0.0543,0.0531,0.1007,0.0888,0.1070,0.1643,0.1852,0.1115,0.1671,0.2436,0.2541,0.2575,0.1702,0.1643,0.1229,0.2002,0.3087,0.3356,0.3667,0.4725,0.4685,0.4330,0.5382,0.5493,0.5139,0.4149,0.3182,0.2399,0.3249,0.2988,0.2645,0.2575,0.2575,0.2292,0.3182,0.3356,0.3460,0.2292,0.2129,0.1251,0.0780,0.0851,0.1070,0.0851,0.0473,0.0380,0.0690,0.0676,0.0734,0.0719,0.0948,0.0690,0.0690,0.0300,0.0676,0.0690,0.1048,0.1137,0.1942,0.1137,0.2002,0.2951,0.2988,0.2884,0.2064,0.3149,0.2680,0.1611,0.1643,0.1528,0.0817,0.0704,0.0948,0.0888,0.1881,0.1791,0.1731,0.1881,0.1702,0.0985,0.1791,0.1137,0.0518,0.0518,0.0555,0.1092,0.0631,0.1115,0.1731,0.2680,0.2715,0.3087,0.3087,0.3704,0.3704,0.3529,0.3494,0.2680,0.2
